name: Package Update Server for WooCommerce
author: nora0123456789

sections.description:
If you want to sell downloadable products with update checker by WooCommerce, try this.
This enables WooCommerce site to generate token related to purchased downloadable product. The generated token allows customers to check for updates to the shop and to download/update the package while the token is valid.
sections.installation:
1. upload to “/wp-content/plugins/package-update-server-for-woocommerce”, or directly search and install from wp repository on your admin page. ( “Plugins” -> “Add New” )
  2. Activate.
sections.faq:
How to use

How-to page is prepared in admin page “WooCommerce” -> “NPUSWC”. Please regard.

What this plugin for?

Selling downloadable products with update checker.

description:
If you want to sell downloadable products with update checker by WooCommerce, try this.
This enables WooCommerce site to generate token related to purchased downloadable product. The generated token allows customers to check for updates to the shop and to download/update the package while the token is valid.

screenshots.caption: General Settings: Very Simple. Just set secret key to secure.
Product Settings: Use Hashed Value generated after save the value.
NPUSWC Client: Generated admin page located in "Dashboard" -> "Token Validator: Name of Package"
